abstract: CBS’s 10 p.m. rerun of “The Mentalist” delivered the largest audience in prime time on Thursday as 9.7 million viewers tuned in to the hit crime show, according to Nielsen’s estimates.
snippet: CBS’s 10 p.m. rerun of “The Mentalist” delivered the largest audience in prime time on Thursday as 9.7 million viewers tuned in to the hit crime show, according to Nielsen’s estimates.
lead_paragraph: CBS’s 10 p.m. rerun of “The Mentalist” delivered the largest audience in prime time on Thursday as 9.7 million viewers tuned in to the hit crime show, according to Nielsen’s estimates.

headline.main: Thursday Ratings: Even in Repeat Mode, ‘Mentalist’ Wins
